server.model

Class ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.model.ClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    Handles all client's operations on server side.

    Examines if client supplies correct password, and then, if so, handles messaging operation, until disconnected.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

      • setNickname

        private void setNickname(java.lang.String msg)
        Establishes client's nickname field (nickname) and prevents client's nicknames from repeating.

        If client name is already used, adds number from 1 and higher to this client's nickname.

        Parameters:
        msg - nickname, received from client;
